trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There were no other sightings in Reno on or around August 24th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsabout 9:pm on friday the 24th of august i went out to smoke a cigarette was looking up at the moon and the planet near it turned to go inside and witnessed a bright light to the north this is not unusual as this is a normal flight path for the reno taho international airport but this was much brighter than landing lights i thought mabey a meterorite but it went so slow and changed direction like a leaf faling in the wind it was very stricking in its behavior so i watched it turn from north south flight to east flight all the while moving left to right like a feather or leaf it went east aproxamatly 8 miles mabey more kinda east south and then went dark still at a very high alltatude it was not normal for anything i know of and i look up everytime im outdoors so ive seen most things flying in the air this was very different and veryy bright and lasted so long idont think it was a meteore or a plane or a sattalite i know what they look like dont know what i saw but had time to go get my wife and she saw it too very strange anyway thought this might help thanks mike
Summary: saw it coming from the north seemed to go left then right like little or no control it was very bright with no flashing lites much brighter than an aircraft landing no disernable shape went from north to east in about 5 min then disapeared
